A list of other geocoding software. If you know another software (preferably Open Source or freeware) and what is interesting or particular about them please let me know so I can add them to the list.

  * [http://www.carto.net/projects/photoTools/gpsPhoto/ gpsPhoto] (multiplateforme command line tool, GPL, also use Exiftool library)
    
  * [http://oregonstate.edu/~earlyj/gpsphotolinker/overview.php Gpsphotolinker] (Mac, freeware)

  * [http://happycamel.sourceforge.net/ Happy Camel] (command line tool for Linux, GPL)

  * [http://www.mmisoftware.co.uk/pages/photogpseditor.php PhotoGpsEditor] (Mac, freeware)

  * [http://www.robogeo.com/home/ Robogeo] (Windows, commercial, lots of features)

  * [http://wwmx.org/Download.aspx  WWMX from Microsoft] (Windows, freeware, needs .Net 1.1)

Konrad Bauckmeier from Germany sent me an impressive list of other geocoding software to add to this page:

  * [http://www.vipros.com/photo/gps2Photo/ GPS2Foto] (freeware, perl script, without gui)
  * [http://www.digikam.org/?q=about/features09x digiKam] (for Linux, Freeware, RAW)
  * [http://www.gps-freeware.de/ GPS Freeware]  (freeware, german only, editing also tracks)
  * [http://software.copiks.se/photomapper/ COPIKS Photo Mapper]  (freeware)
  * [http://www.picopolo.de/ Picopolo]  (freeware, also for Image-Management)
  * [http://www.mmisoftware.co.uk/pages/photogpseditor.php GPSFotoEditor]  for Mac
(Donationware)
